card.data.levitate.name: Levitate
card.data.levitate.actions.basic: Pay <style="value">1 - 5</style> Movement to <style="status">Teleport</style> that many spaces on the map
card.data.levitate.actions.advanced: <style="status">Cancel</style> targeted Enemy's Attack. Pay <style="value">1</style> Movement to target a second Enemy, <style="value">2</style> for a third Enemy, etc
